Docs.summary: A class loader is an object that is responsible for loading classes.

Docs.param: The bytes that make up the class data. The bytes in positions off through off+len-1 should have the format of a valid class file as defined by <cite>The Java™ Virtual Machine Specification</cite>.
The start offset in b of the class data
The length of the class data
Docs.summary: Converts an array of bytes into an instance of class Class.
Docs.returns: The Class object that was created from the specified class data

abstract member SetClassAssertionStatus : string * bool -> unit override this.SetClassAssertionStatus : string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The fully qualified class name of the top-level class whose assertion status is to be set.
true if the named class is to have assertions enabled when (and if) it is initialized, false if the class is to have assertions disabled.
Docs.summary: Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein.

Docs.param: true if classes loaded by this class loader will henceforth have assertions enabled by default, false if they will have assertions disabled by default.
Docs.summary: Sets the default assertion status for this class loader.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetPackageAssertionStatus (string? packageName, bool enabled);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPackageAssertionStatus(string packageName, bool enabled) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub SetPackageAssertionStatus (packageName As String, enabled As Boolean)
public: virtual void SetPackageAssertionStatus(System::String ^ packageName, bool enabled);
abstract member SetPackageAssertionStatus : string * bool -> unit override this.SetPackageAssertionStatus : string * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The name of the package whose package default assertion status is to be set. A null value indicates the unnamed package that is "current" (see section 7.4.2 of <cite>The Java™ Language Specification</cite>.)

true if classes loaded by this classloader and belonging to the named package or any of its subpackages will have assertions enabled by default, false if they will have assertions disabled by default.
Docs.summary: Sets the package default assertion status for the named package.
